h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Wind Bear Staff Location
content: The Wind Bear Staff can be found in Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain upon defeating Black Bear Guai in Black Wind Mountain. This is a mandatory boss at the end of the chapter, so you can't miss him. When you load into Chapter 2, you will be able to craft it at a Shrine.

The content is as follows:
The Wind Bear Staff can be found in Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain upon defeating Black Bear Guai in Black Wind Mountain. This is a mandatory boss at the end of the chapter, so you can't miss him. When you load into Chapter 2, you will be able to craft it at a Shrine.
